sqlMap.select: select t3.INST_ID,t2.inst_name,t2.bill_code,t2.bill_no, t2.industry_type,t2.vendor_name,t2.tax_no,t2.amt,t2.tax_rate, t2.tax_amt,t2.amt_tax_sum,date_format(t2.bill_date,'%Y-%m-%d') bill_date,t2.datastatus data_status, t2.direction_id,t2.direction_name,t2.transfer_amt,t2.transfer_ratio, t2.untransfer_amt,t2.PORPUSE_CODE,t2.PORPUSE,t2.transfer_status, t2.data_source,t2.deduc_ratio, t2.deduc_amt,t2.deduc_date, t2.bill_type ,t2.GL_INTERFACE_ID ,t2.EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID ,date_format(t2.WRITE_OFF_COMPLETED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') WRITE_OFF_COMPLETED_DATE, date_format(t2.AUDIT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AUDIT_DATE,attribute2 from hec.VMS_INPUT_INVOICE_NEW@gd_db t2,VMS_INST_MAPPING t3 where t2.inst_id=t3.FK_INST_ID and t2.imported_flag =#IMPORTED_FLAG#
sqlMap.update: update VMS_INPUT_INVOICE_NEW set INST_ID=#INST_ID#,INST_NAME=#INST_NAME#,BILL_CODE=#BILL_CODE#,BILL_NO=#BILL_NO#, INDUSTRY_TYPE=#INDUSTRY_TYPE#,VENDOR_NAME=#VENDOR_NAME#,TAX_NO=#TAX_NO#,AMT=#AMT#,TAX_RATE=#TAX_RATE#, TAX_AMT=#TAX_AMT#,AMT_TAX_SUM=#AMT_TAX_SUM#,BILL_DATE=#BILL_DATE#,DATA_STATUS=#DATA_STATUS#, DIRECTION_ID=#DIRECTION_ID#,DIRECTION_NAME=#DIRECTION_NAME#,TRANSFER_AMT=#TRANSFER_AMT#,TRANSFER_RATIO=#TRANSFER_RATIO#, UNTRANSFER_AMT=#UNTRANSFER_AMT#,PORPUSE_CODE=#PORPUSE_CODE#,PORPUSE=#PORPUSE#,TRANSFER_STATUS=#TRANSFER_STATUS#, DATA_SOURCE=#DATA_SOURCE#,DEDUC_RATIO=#DEDUC_RATIO#,DEDUC_AMT=#DEDUC_AMT#,DEDUC_DATE=#DEDUC_DATE#, BILL_TYPE=#BILL_TYPE#,AUDIT_DATE=#AUDIT_DATE# where GL_INTERFACE_ID=#GL_INTERFACE_ID# and EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID=#EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID#

update VMS_INPUT_INVOICE_NEW set INST_ID=#INST_ID#,INST_NAME=#INST_NAME#,BILL_CODE=#BILL_CODE#,BILL_NO=#BILL_NO#, INDUSTRY_TYPE=#INDUSTRY_TYPE#,VENDOR_NAME=#VENDOR_NAME#,TAX_NO=#TAX_NO#,AMT=#AMT#,TAX_RATE=#TAX_RATE#, TAX_AMT=#TAX_AMT#,AMT_TAX_SUM=#AMT_TAX_SUM#,BILL_DATE=#BILL_DATE#,DATA_STATUS=#DATA_STATUS#, DIRECTION_ID=#DIRECTION_ID#,DIRECTION_NAME=#DIRECTION_NAME#,TRANSFER_AMT=#TRANSFER_AMT#,TRANSFER_RATIO=#TRANSFER_RATIO#, UNTRANSFER_AMT=#UNTRANSFER_AMT#,PORPUSE_CODE=#PORPUSE_CODE#,PORPUSE=#PORPUSE#,TRANSFER_STATUS=#TRANSFER_STATUS#, DATA_SOURCE=#DATA_SOURCE#,DEDUC_RATIO=#DEDUC_RATIO#,DEDUC_AMT=#DEDUC_AMT#,DEDUC_DATE=#DEDUC_DATE#, BILL_TYPE=#BILL_TYPE#,AUDIT_DATE=#WRITE_OFF_COMPLETED_DATE# where GL_INTERFACE_ID=#GL_INTERFACE_ID# and EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID=#EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID#
update hec.VMS_INPUT_INVOICE_NEW@gd_db set imported_flag ='0' where GL_INTERFACE_ID=#GL_INTERFACE_ID# and EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID=#EXP_REPORT_LINE_ID#
sqlMap.insert: insert into cux_zzs_interface (COMPANY_CODE,COMPANY_NAME,ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME,ACCOUNT_DETAIL_CODE,ACCOUNT_DETAIL_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,PERIOD_NAME, BEGIN_BALANCE_AMOUNT,PERIOD_NET_DR,PERIOD_NET_CR,END_BALANCE_AMOUNT, SYSTIME) (select t2.inst_id COMPANY_CODE,t.COMPANY_NAME,t.ACCOUNT_CODE, t.ACCOUNT_NAME,t.ACCOUNT_DETAIL_CODE,t.ACCOUNT_DETAIL_NAME, t.PRODUCT_CODE,t.PRODUCT_NAME,t.PERIOD_NAME, t.BEGIN_BALANCE_AMOUNT,t.PERIOD_NET_DR,t.PERIOD_NET_CR,t.END_BALANCE_AMOUNT, t.SYSTIME from cux_zzs_interface@cwxt_db t,vms_inst_mapping t2,CUX_FILTER_CONDITION t3 where t.PERIOD_NAME = #PERIOD_NAME# and t2.fk_inst_id = t.company_code and t3.account_code = t.account_code and t3.account_detail_code = t.account_detail_code)
